title: Loss Prevention for AFK from not connecting in to game?
body: I think we need a loss prevent system for when someone doesn't connect at all into a game. I think it is a very good and fair idea :)

replies.body: put they could just quit before they connect in ranked because they want to troll O_o
or because they used lolnexus to check on their teammates kda's and decided that someone was ♥♥♥♥. Or because they thought their team comp wasn't as good as the enemies team comp.
